name: Tieke He
content: Pascal 何铁科 Tieke He, Ph.D. Associate Professor Software Institute, Nanjing University Office: Room 912, FeiYimin Building, Nanjing University, Nanjing, 210093, China Tel: +86-25 83621360 EXT 932 Email: hetieke {AT} nju DOT edu DOT cn or hetieke {AT} gmail DOT com I'm looking for talented and hardworking students interested in Software Engineering, Knowledge Graph and Question Answering, drop me a CV if interested.
